title: Guilt
verses: Psalm 32:1–2 (WEB) — “Blessed is he whose disobedience is forgiven, whose sin is covered.”
Isaiah 1:18 (WEB) — “Though your sins are as scarlet, they shall be as white as snow.”
Hebrews 9:14 (WEB) — “The blood of Christ… will cleanse your conscience from dead works to serve the living God.”
Romans 8:1 (WEB) — “There is therefore now no condemnation to those who are in Christ Jesus.”
body: Guilt drives us to Christ, who cleanses the conscience and cancels the record of debt. Confess, believe the gospel, and walk in freedom with a renewed mind.
prayer: Lamb of God, thank You for cleansing my guilt. Let Your pardon quiet my heart and Your Spirit lead me in new obedience. Amen.
